<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RequiresResidual =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">      !LoopOpIsInt8 &amp;&amp; !(AtomicElementSize &amp;&amp; LoopOpSize == AtomicElementSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RequiresResidual) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ResLoopOpType = AtomicElementSize</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">                              ? <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#acaf8e4c3e40e01e848c1fad5f05b81cd">Type::getIntNTy</a>(Ctx, &#42;AtomicElementSize &#42; 8)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">                              : Int8Type;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ResLoopOpSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeStoreSize(ResLoopOpType);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((ResLoopOpSize == AtomicElementSize ? &#42;AtomicElementSize : 1) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Residual loop header.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Need to update the pre-loop basic block to branch to the correct place.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// branch to the main loop if the count is non-zero, branch to the residual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loop if the copy size is smaller then 1 iteration of the main loop but</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// non-zero and finally branch to after the residual loop if the memcpy</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a9696bc411b0a7022c2cc78bff5173cefad7ed4ee1df437474d005188535f74875">Zero</a> = ConstantInt::get(ILengthType, 0U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal">    PLBuilder.CreateCondBr(PLBuilder.CreateICmpNE(RuntimeLoopBytes, Zero),</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In this case the loop operand type was a byte, and there is no need for a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// residual loop to copy the remaining memory after the main loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We do however need to patch up the control flow by creating the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// terminators for the preloop block and the memcpy loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a9696bc411b0a7022c2cc78bff5173cefad7ed4ee1df437474d005188535f74875">Zero</a> = ConstantInt::get(ILengthType, 0U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">    PLBuilder.CreateCondBr(PLBuilder.CreateICmpNE(RuntimeLoopBytes, Zero),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">                           LoopBB, PostLoopBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">    PreLoopBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a601ee49a4c4e0babf29bd1cf09036570">eraseFromParent</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">    LoopBuilder.CreateCondBr(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">        LoopBuilder.CreateICmpULT(NewIndex, RuntimeLoopBytes), LoopBB,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">        PostLoopBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If \\p Addr1 and \\p Addr2 are pointers to different address spaces, create an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// addresspacecast to obtain a pair of pointers in the same addressspace. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// caller needs to ensure that addrspacecasting is possible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// No-op if the pointers are in the same address space.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::pair&lt;Value &#42;, Value &#42;&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357" lineLink="#a19caca7bafe1b8a5f67802ce62431282"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="#a19caca7bafe1b8a5f67802ce62431282">tryInsertCastToCommonAddrSpace</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase">IRBuilderBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Addr1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Addr2,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">                               </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ResAddr1 = Addr1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ResAddr2 = Addr2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AS1 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;PointerType&gt;</a>(Addr1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>())-&gt;getAddressSpace();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AS2 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;PointerType&gt;</a>(Addr2-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>())-&gt;getAddressSpace();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AS1 != AS2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.isValidAddrSpaceCast(AS2, AS1))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">      ResAddr2 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateAddrSpaceCast(Addr2, Addr1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.isValidAddrSpaceCast(AS1, AS2))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">      ResAddr1 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateAddrSpaceCast(Addr1, Addr2-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Can only lower memmove between address spaces if they &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">                       </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;support addrspacecast&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;ResAddr1, ResAddr2&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Lower memmove to IR. memmove is required to correctly copy overlapping memory</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// regions; therefore, it has to check the relative positions of the source and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// destination pointers and choose the copy direction accordingly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The code below is an IR rendition of this C function:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// void&#42; memmove(void&#42; dst, const void&#42; src, size&#95;t n) &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   unsigned char&#42; d = dst;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   const unsigned char&#42; s = src;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   if (s &lt; d) &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     // copy backwards</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     while (n--) &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       d&#91;n&#93; = s&#91;n&#93;;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#125; else &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     // copy forward</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     for (size&#95;t i = 0; i &lt; n; ++i) &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       d&#91;i&#93; = s&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   return dst;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the TargetTransformInfo specifies a wider MemcpyLoopLoweringType, it is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// used for the memory accesses in the loops. Then, additional loops with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// byte-wise accesses are added for the remaining bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402" lineLink="#af1d16783f6f4b4d20427e93da6dd606f"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#af1d16783f6f4b4d20427e93da6dd606f">createMemMoveLoopUnknownSize</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;InsertBefore,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SrcAddr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;DstAddr,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;CopyLen, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> SrcAlign,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SkipMainCondition =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">      PLBuilder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a8c75539a39f167f352b37ccdd788a7e4">CreateICmpEQ</a>(RuntimeLoopBytes, Zero, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;skip&#95;main&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create the a comparison of src and dst, based on which we jump to either</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the forward-copy part of the function (if src &gt;= dst) or the backwards-copy</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// part (if src &lt; dst).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SplitBlockAndInsertIfThenElse conveniently creates the basic if-then-else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// structure. Its block terminators (unconditional branches) are replaced by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the appropriate conditional branches when the loop is built.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the pointers are in different address spaces, they need to be converted</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to a compatible one. Cases where memory ranges in the different address</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// spaces cannot overlap are lowered as memcpy and not handled here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;CmpSrcAddr, CmpDstAddr&#93; =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="#a19caca7bafe1b8a5f67802ce62431282">tryInsertCastToCommonAddrSpace</a>(PLBuilder, SrcAddr, DstAddr, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;PtrCompare =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal">      PLBuilder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a09b4daefdf5b73efba51ce7ae6cd45c5">CreateICmpULT</a>(CmpSrcAddr, CmpDstAddr, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;compare&#95;src&#95;dst&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;ThenTerm, &#42;ElseTerm;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7ac00229d8c59902686f52ed061cdc80">SplitBlockAndInsertIfThenElse</a>(PtrCompare, InsertBefore-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal">                                &amp;ThenTerm, &amp;ElseTerm);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the LoopOpSize is greater than 1, each part of the function consists of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// four blocks:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   memmove&#95;copy&#95;backwards:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       skip the residual loop when 0 iterations are required</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   memmove&#95;bwd&#95;residual&#95;loop:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       copy the last few bytes individually so that the remaining length is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       a multiple of the LoopOpSize</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   memmove&#95;bwd&#95;middle: skip the main loop when 0 iterations are required</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   memmove&#95;bwd&#95;main&#95;loop: the actual backwards loop BB with wide accesses</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   memmove&#95;copy&#95;forward: skip the main loop when 0 iterations are required</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   memmove&#95;fwd&#95;main&#95;loop: the actual forward loop BB with wide accesses</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   memmove&#95;fwd&#95;middle: skip the residual loop when 0 iterations are required</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   memmove&#95;fwd&#95;residual&#95;loop: copy the last few bytes individually</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The main and residual loop are switched between copying forward and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// backward so that the residual loop always operates on the end of the moved</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// range. This is based on the assumption that buffers whose start is aligned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with the LoopOpSize are more common than buffers whose end is.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the LoopOpSize is 1, each part of the function consists of two blocks:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   memmove&#95;copy&#95;backwards: skip the loop when 0 iterations are required</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   memmove&#95;bwd&#95;main&#95;loop: the actual backwards loop BB</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   memmove&#95;copy&#95;forward: skip the loop when 0 iterations are required</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   memmove&#95;fwd&#95;main&#95;loop: the actual forward loop BB</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;CopyBackwardsBB = ThenTerm-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> ResDstAlign(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd6aa057934751aaac54e5c18bcc18eb">commonAlignment</a>(DstAlign, BytesCopied));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OperandSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeStoreSize(OpTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we used LoopOpType as GEP element type, we would iterate over the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// buffers in TypeStoreSize strides while copying TypeAllocSize bytes, i.e.,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we would miss bytes if TypeStoreSize != TypeAllocSize. Therefore, use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// byte offsets computed from the TypeStoreSize.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SrcGEP = Builder.CreateInBoundsGEP(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><Highlight kind="normal">        Int8Type, SrcAddr, ConstantInt::get(TypeOfCopyLen, BytesCopied));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &#42;Load =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><Highlight kind="normal">        Builder.CreateAlignedLoad(OpTy, SrcGEP, ResSrcAlign, SrcIsVolatile);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;DstGEP = Builder.CreateInBoundsGEP(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><Highlight kind="normal">        Int8Type, DstAddr, ConstantInt::get(TypeOfCopyLen, BytesCopied));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="normal">    Builder.CreateAlignedStore(Load, DstGEP, ResDstAlign, DstIsVolatile);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><Highlight kind="normal">    BytesCopied += OperandSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Copying backwards.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RemainingBytes != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><Highlight kind="normal">    CopyBackwardsBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a35ee267850af7c235474a8c46c7ac5af">setName</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;memmove&#95;bwd&#95;residual&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t BytesCopied = BytesCopiedInLoop;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Residual code is required to move the remaining bytes. We need the same</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions as in the forward case, only in reverse. So we generate code</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the same way, except that we change the IRBuilder insert point for each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// load/store pair so that each one is inserted before the previous one</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instead of after it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> BwdResBuilder(CopyBackwardsBB,</Highlight></CodeLine>
